news_header: South Korean footballer Hwang Ui-jo apologizes for secretly filming sexual encounters without consent.
news_text: Hwang Ui-jo, a 31-year-old South Korean football player, has apologized in court for secretly filming sexual encounters with two partners without their consent between June and September 2022. His actions came to light when his sister-in-law attempted to blackmail him by sharing the videos on social media, leading to her imprisonment for three years. Despite her conviction, Hwang faces legal charges for filming the videos illegally. In his court appearance, he expressed deep remorse for disappointing his supporters and victims, pledging to avoid wrongdoing in the future.
